#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
using namespace std;
#define max 10000005
#define MOD 1000000007
int sum[max];
void store()
{
    long long term=7,s;
    sum[1]=7;
    for(int i=2;i<=max;i++)
    {
        term=(10*term+7)%MOD;
        sum[i]=((long long)sum[i-1]+term)%MOD;
    }
}
int main()
{
    int t,n;
    store();
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        scanf("%d",&n);
        printf("%d\n",sum[n]);
    }
}
